name: Definition - Pig Maduro Perfecto
additionalNotes: Definition is an emerging cigar boutique based in Texas that is quickly gaining enthusiastic followers in the tobacco world. His portfolio leans towards the mature, but are not afraid to explore the creation of excellent cigars wrapped in Connecticut, Sumatra and Habano. In a gesture of mystery, Definition keeps secret the identity of those who make their cigars, which adds a touch of intrigue to the brand. Definition’s nylon cigars are more than just eye-catching; they’re a unique experience you can’t miss.
